channel.title: Noel Clarke on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Noel Clarke Loses Libel Case Against The Guardian
item.description: British actor, director and producer Noel Clarke has lost his libel case against The Guardian, having sued the U.K. newspaper’s publisher for printing allegations of sexual misconduct in 2021. T
